statements.name: PROC CATALOG
statements.description: Copies entries from one SAS catalog to another.

statements.name: CHANGE
statements.description: Renames one or more catalog entry names.

statements.name: CONTENTS
statements.description: Lists the contents of a catalog in the procedure output or writes a list of the contents to a SAS data set, an external file, or both.

statements.name: COPY
statements.description: Copies some or all of the entries in one catalog to another catalog.

statements.name: DELETE
statements.description: Deletes entries from a SAS catalog.

statements.name: EXCHANGE
statements.description: Switches the name of two catalog entries.

statements.name: EXCLUDE
statements.description: Specifies entries that the COPY statement does not copy.

statements.name: MODIFY
statements.description: Changes the description of a catalog entry.

statements.name: SAVE
statements.description: Specifies entries not to delete from a SAS catalog.

statements.name: SELECT
statements.description: Specifies entries that the COPY statement copies.

statements.name: QUIT
statements.description: Executes any statements that have not executed and ends the procedure.
